EN

The provided article text features interviews from the FMLS:25 summit rather than the news headline suggested. Jonathan Fine interviews Dor Eligula of BridgeWise regarding the integration of AI in investment research, identifying growth opportunities in Asian markets, and how retail investors can safely utilize AI. Additionally, the text includes an interview with Brendan Callan, CEO of TRADU, who won a debate arguing against the current Prop Trading model, criticizing its reliance on fees, loose risk management, and lack of clarity for retail clients.

Key Points

  • BridgeWise discusses the rollout of AI in investment research and growth in Asian markets.
  • Brendan Callan of TRADU critiques the current Prop Trading model for fee dependency and risk issues.
  • The interviews cover the balance between automation and human judgment in financial services.

Article
